articles.content: Interest rates on bulk fixed deposits above 2 crore at ICICI Bank have been revised on various tenures. The highest FD rate is 4.6% given on deposits from above 2 crore to less than 5 crore on tenure… [+29 chars]

articles.title: Tata Steel looks at other markets for coal imports - Economic Times
articles.description: Tata Steel will look at alternative markets for coal imports as transactions with Russian suppliers and bankers at present come with a  lot of uncertainties,  managing director TV Narendran, told reporters on the sidelines of an event in Kolkata. The company …

articles.title: Shiba Inu To Reach $0.001 After Bitgert Plans To Launch Wrapped Shiba Inu Token? - Analytics Insight
articles.description: Shiba Inu is an Ethereum-based token, and thus high gas fee on the Ethereum chain has been slowing its performance. But Bitgert (BRISE) is making things better for Shiba Inu.
